root.name: Family Party: 30 Great Games - Obstacle Arcade
root.description: OverviewFamily Party: 30 Great Games - Obstacle Arcade is a mini-game collection developed by ART Co. and published by D3 Publisher for the Wii U platform.GameplayFamily Party: 30 Great Games - Obstacle Arcade contains 30 different party games, each of which can be played with up to four players. There are special 3-on-1 party games in which the lone player uses the Wii U GamePad.
